articles.content: The much-awaited Asia Cup is set to commence on August 30 with the match between designated hosts Pakistan and Nepal in Multan. Team India will start its campaign on September against arch-rivals Pak… [+1918 chars]

articles.title: With just 6 hours of sleep Assam's Ripunjoy Gogoi completes Paris-Brest-Paris 1,200 km cycling event - India Today NE
articles.description: Ripunjoy Gogoi's determination not to sleep more than 6 hours enabled him to complete the Paris-Brest-Paris cycling event in an 88:30-hour time frame.
articles.content: A young computer engineer hailing from Guwahati, Ripunjoy Gogoi, achieved a milestone by successfully completing one of the most difficult cycle events, Paris-Brest-Paris (PBP), recently held from Au… [+2513 chars]
